data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 590,728 lost in Tshopo that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tshopo, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Tshopo, Democratic Republic of the Congo to the gospel today.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 529,643 cultural Christians in the state of Tshopo to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Tshopo, Democratic Republic of the Congo the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Tshopo.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Tshopo who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Tshopo, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.focus_label: Tshopo, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary:
the state of Tshopo, Democratic Republic of the Congo has a population of 731,300.

We estimate Tshopo has 140,573 people who might know Jesus, 529,643 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 61,085 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Tshopo
location.full_name: Tshopo, Democratic Republic of the Congo
